data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Middelburgs Welvaren cruise from Rotterdam to Guinea started at 1754-12-23
Ship: Middelburgs Welvaren, Voyage: Rotterdam - Guinea, 1st Observer: J. Van Kerkhoven (Schipper), Company: MCC
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
